locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Contributes XMetaDissPlus 2.2 schemas and application adapters.
This plugin generates meta-data in XMetaDissPlus 2.2 format from OMP publication formats. Required elements that cannot be mapped to OMP meta-data fields can be set here.
The place of the publishing organization (e.g. Heidelberg) is a mandatory field in the Corporate Core Schema.
The full address of the publishing organization (e.g. Pl√∂ck 107-109, 69117 Heidelberg) is a mandatory field in the Corporate Core Schema.

Identification number assigned by the DNB must be Fxxxx-xxxx, where x in [0-9], e.g. F1234-5678 (optional).DDB Access Rights Invalid identification number. DDB Access Rights Mandatory definition of DNB access rights for archived copies.
File Transfer Settings Select a genre to determine which submission file is transfered via XMetaDissPlus. If several files of the same genre are available for a publication format, the first entry is transfered by default.
